 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁזַר‎</span>]<sub>21</sub> **verb Hoph\`al** ==be twisted== (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁזַר‎</span> ***twist***; compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***look a skew at***, also ***twist*** cord ***from the left*** [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>ES 49</sup> (explanation <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span>, for normal <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂ‎</span>, as dissimilated before <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ז‎</span>), [[BDB#Jacob|Jacob]]<sup>Arabic Dichter i. 52</sup>); — ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֵׁשׁ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָשְׁזָר‎</span> [[Exod.26.1|Exod 26:1]]; [[Exod.26.31|Exod 26:31]]; [[Exod.26.36|Exod 26:36]] + 17 t. Exodus ([[BDB#P|P]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֵׁשׁ‎</span> omitted [[Exod.39.24|Exod 39:24]]. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁח‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁחח‎</span>.
